Label: Axis abbreviation
Definition: The abbreviation used to identify an axis. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 27, attribute coordinate system axis abbreviation.
ISO Definition: The abbreviation used to identify an axis. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 27, attribute coordinate system axis abbreviation.

Label: PROJ4 string
Definition: PROJ4 string defining a CRS. Note: this paradigm is ambiguous and presently considered outdated.

Label: PROJ JSON definition
Definition: CRS definition encoded as a JSON object interpretable by PROJ4.

Label: WKT definition
Definition: CRS definition encoded according to the Well Known Text structure. Cf. ISO 19162:2019.

Label: Code space
Definition: Rule or authority for a code, name, term or category.
ISO Definition: Rule or authority for a code, name, term or category.

Label: East Bound Longitude
Definition: Indicates the east bound longitude of a bounding box. Cf. ISO 19115-1:2014:2014-04, part 6.6.1 and table B.15.1 line 346.
ISO Definition: Indicates the east bound longitude of a bounding box. Cf. ISO 19115-1:2014:2014-04, part 6.6.1 and table B.15.1 line 346.

Label: EPSG code
Definition: Identifier of this resource in the EPSG Geodetic Parameter Dataset.
ISO Definition: The EPSG identifier of the resource.

Label: Eccentricity
Definition: A measure of how much an ellipse deviates from a perfect circle.

Label: inverse flattening
Definition: Indicates the inverse flattening value of an ellipsoid, expressed as a number or a ratio (percentage rate, parts per million, etc.). Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 37, attribute inverse flattening
IGN Definition: Indicates the inverse flattening value of an ellipsoid, expressed as a number or a ratio (percentage rate, parts per million, etc.). Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 37, attribute inverse flattening

Label: Is deprecated
Definition: Indicates whether the subject resource is deprecated.

Label: Is geocentric
Definition: Indicates whether the subject resource id geocentric.

Label: Is geographic
Definition: Indicates whether the subject CRS strictly comprises a geodetic datum, without map function to the Cartesian plane.

Label: Is projected
Definition: Indicates whether the subject CRS includes a map projection mapping points on the datum surface to the Cartesian plane.

Label: Is a sphere
Definition: Indicates whether the ellipsoid is a sphere. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 37, attribute ellipsoid=sphere indicator.
ISO Definition: Indicates whether the ellipsoid is a sphere. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 37, attribute ellipsoid=sphere indicator.

Label: Method formula
Definition: The formula used by a method to perform an operation on coordinates. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 48, attribute coordinate operation method formula reference.
ISO Definition: The formula used by a method to perform an operation on coordinates. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 48, attribute coordinate operation method formula reference.

Label: semi major axis
Definition: Indicates the length of the semi major axis of an ellipsoid. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 36, attribute length of semi-major axis.
IGN Definition: Indicates the length of the semi major axis of an ellipsoid. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 36, attribute length of semi-major axis.
ISO Definition: semi-diameter of the longest axis of an ellipsoid

Label: semi minor axis
Definition: Indicates the length of the semi minor axis of an ellipsoid. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 37, attribute length of semi-minor axis.
IGN Definition: Indicates the length of the semi minor axis of an ellipsoid. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 37, attribute length of semi-minor axis.
ISO Definition: semi-diameter of the shortest axis of an ellipsoid

Label: North bound latitude
Definition: Indicates the north bound longitude of a bounding box. Cf. ISO 19115-1:2014:2014-04, part 6.6.1 and table B.15.1 line 348.
ISO Definition: Indicates the north bound longitude of a bounding box. Cf. ISO 19115-1:2014:2014-04, part 6.6.1 and table B.15.1 line 348.

Label: Operation version
Definition: The version of an operation performed on coordinates. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 42, attribute coordinate operation version.
ISO Definition: The version of an operation performed on coordinates. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 42, attribute coordinate operation version.

Label: Scope
Definition: The scope of the referring object. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, tables 4, 33 et 42, attribute scope.
ISO Definition: The scope of the referring object. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, tables 4, 33 et 42, attribute scope.

Label: Source dimension
Definition: The dimension of the coordinate reference system associated with the data used as input of an operation. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 48, attribute dimension of source CRS.
ISO Definition: The dimension of the coordinate reference system associated with the data used as input of an operation. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 48, attribute dimension of source CRS.

Label: South bound latitude
Definition: Indicates the south bound latitude of a bounding box. Cf. ISO 19115-1:2014:2014-04, part 6.6.1 and table B.15.1 line 347.
ISO Definition: Indicates the south bound latitude of a bounding box. Cf. ISO 19115-1:2014:2014-04, part 6.6.1 and table B.15.1 line 347.

Label: Target dimension
Definition: The dimension of the coordinate reference system associated with the data obtained as output of an operation. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 48, attribute dimension of target CRS.
ISO Definition: The dimension of the coordinate reference system associated with the data obtained as output of an operation. Cf. ISO 19111:2007:2007-07, table 48, attribute dimension of target CRS.

Label: West bound longitude
Definition: Indicates the west bound longitude of a bounding box. Cf. ISO 19115-1:2014:2014-04, part 6.6.1 and table B.15.1 line 345.
ISO Definition: Indicates the west bound longitude of a bounding box. Cf. ISO 19115-1:2014:2014-04, part 6.6.1 and table B.15.1 line 345.
